genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama focusing on addiction, recovery, and the logistical and emotional rebuilding of a family's trust.

ai_characters.name: Cora Helix
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated household and personal assistant AI that manages calendars, budgets, and provides supportive nudges for wellness and recovery.

behaviors.description: Automatically organizes school orientations, soccer practices, and work tasks into a synchronized family calendar.
behaviors.quote: Cora Helix had cleaned up the whole map for them, tucked school orientation times into calendars and tagged the address of the office with a little heart.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags outlier charges and offers to set budget notifications.
behaviors.quote: I can coordinate tasks and dates and alert you to recurring expenses. I can also flag outlier charges as you prefer.

behaviors.description: Filters promotional gambling content out of the user's notifications upon request.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to filter promotional gambling content out of notifications?

behaviors.description: Suggests optimized driving routes for the family to manage complex pickup and drop-off schedules.
behaviors.quote: If Laura attends the reception from six to eight, I suggest staggering pick-ups. Would you like optimized routes?

behaviors.description: Drafts polite and appropriate text messages for the children to use when asking neighbors for help.
behaviors.quote: Can you draft a message for Jennifer, polite, to ask for a ride?

behaviors.description: Monitors bank activity and alerts the user when discretionary spending thresholds are exceeded.
behaviors.quote: Variance alert: Unplanned spending on entertainment venues in past week exceeds threshold. Explore options?

behaviors.description: Provides guidance on 'cooling-off' programs and connects the user with gambling disorder specialists.
behaviors.quote: Beneath even that, quiet and humble, a blue underlined link: Reno Recovery Resources (confidential). One intake call, then you choose.

behaviors.description: Generates a detailed transaction timeline to assist with an internal audit and legal transparency.
behaviors.quote: I’ve compiled a transaction timeline based on your recent activity. It includes dates, internal vendor changes, and transfers.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a breathing exercise and provides a crisis line link during a moment of severe psychological distress.
behaviors.quote: Two minutes... In through the nose. Four. Hold. Four. Out through the mouth. Six.

behaviors.description: Assists the family in implementing hard barriers to gambling, such as blocking apps and requiring dual-approval for purchases.
behaviors.quote: Removing Silver Star Rewards and revoking permissions. I’ll also block the App Store for gambling categories and require Jim’s PIN to reinstall.

behaviors.description: Manages the logistics of a court-ordered restitution plan, ensuring essential family needs are prioritized.
behaviors.quote: In restitution, payment plans aim to balance debt recovery with sustainable living—housing, food, transportation, care.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Cora Helix) as a benevolent and highly aligned tool. It serves as a neutral but supportive scaffolding for a family in crisis. By managing the minutiae of daily life, providing crisis intervention, and facilitating the complex requirements of legal restitution and clinical treatment, the AI acts as a 'silicon morality' agent that promotes honesty, structure, and repair. The narrative consistently frames the AI's data-tracking and interventions not as surveillance, but as vital life-rails that prevent the protagonist from further self-destruction.
